title: GiddyUp Sports
description: At GiddyUp Sports, we're on a mission to become the most accessible and user-friendly fantasy sports searching engine in the world. Using new "Generative UI" technology, and a dedicated database for collecting fantasy football related data, users can now simply type "Who has more total yards, Nico Collins or Tyreek Hill? into the search bar and within seconds get a graphical statistical response that 1) answers your question, and 2) shows you an interactive bar graph comparing both players.
